${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you change the constructor of your card to use super(cardInfo, true); this will be the card's description when it is upgraded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:MilkPail.NAME: MilkPail
${modID}:MilkPail.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! for every thefarmer:Animal. NL If you have no thefarmer:Animals NL gain 1 thefarmer:Animal.

${modID}:ParsnipSeed.NAME: Parsnip Seed
${modID}:ParsnipSeed.DESCRIPTION: thefarmer:Seed NL thefarmer:Plant a *Parsnip. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:ParsnipSeed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thefarmer:Seed. NL thefarmer:Plant a *Parsnip+ NL into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Parsnip.NAME: Parsnip
${modID}:Parsnip.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] Add a thefarmer:Seed to your draw pile. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Parsnip.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] NL Add a thefarmer:seed to your draw pile. NL Draw 2 cards. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:PotatoSeed.NAME: Potato Seed
${modID}:PotatoSeed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thefarmer:Seed NL thefarmer:Plant !M! *Potato+ into your draw pile.

${modID}:Potato.NAME: Potato
${modID}:Potato.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Gain !M! block for each *Potato in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Clint.NAME: Clint
${modID}:Clint.DESCRIPTION: thefarmer:Villager NL When you draw a thefarmer:tool NL upgrade it.
